entry.def: Obsolescence is the state of being no longer needed because something newer or more efficient has been invented.

example.ex: The aircraft was nearing obsolescence by early 1942.
example.tran: 这种飞机在1942年年初就濒临淘汰了。

means.word_mean: 1. the process of becoming obsolete; falling into disuse or becoming out of date;
